name: No Way Home (Pyxwin Studios)
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 3 HOURS FOR THE 153rd TRIJAM #trijam

The theme of this Game Jam was EMPTY WORLD.

Description 

You are living all alone in this deserted empty world. Currently you are lost in the sandstorm and have lost the way back to home.

Listen closely to the sound of the bells ringing from your home and run towards it in order to reach home before the times runs out.

Controls

WASD - for movement

Hold Shift - to run 

Spacebar - to jump 

**Headphones are required for better sound experience**

Credits

House Model was taken from sketchfab.

Sounds were used from freesound

Download Instructions

1. Download zip

2. Extract zip

3. Play the Game

*PS : This was my first GameJam and time was also limited so I will surely improve my skills in future.
